description: Katsuragi Miki was NH TV`s anchorwoman for the National News, and the MC for the New Year`s Eve Battle of the Bands. Having resigned recently, she has been appointed anchorwoman at News Nine. A woman of style and substance, she is a household name. Her dark secret? An addiction to masturbation, which she can`t stop even when on air. All is well until the cue-card holder catches her at it ...
name: Katsuragi Miki
